entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @SteveFDA "I'm not going to get into who is right and who is wrong.” —Stephen Hawn, Commissioner of the US Food and Drug Administration, on Trump’s irresponsible and UNFOUNDED claim that 99% of coronavirus cases are “totally harmless.”

But THAT’S the very DEFINITION of your JOB, Stephen!!
